definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)

supercar/abbr. to 超跑|超跑[chao1 pao3]

sentences.english: Jane Zhang did a cover of this song during her performance at Super Girl.

sentences.english: And today his campaign expects more super delegates will be announcing their support for Obama. Mara Liasson, NPR News, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 今天在競選中他期待更多超級代表的選票。

sentences.english: The Maybach has been adopted as the ultimate status symbol by Russia's super-rich.
sentences.chinese: 邁巴赫被視作俄國超級富豪的”終極身份象徵“。

sentences.english: This nutrient superstar is found concentrated in the brightly colored skins and flesh of most foods in their natural form.
sentences.chinese: 該超級營養素在天然果蔬的色彩繽紛的皮肉中很多。

sentences.english: <div class="cfx">The list also reflected breakneck advances in supercomputing speeds.
sentences.chinese: 這份排名還反映了在超級計算速度方面的極快進步。

sentences.english: Our packing is in Chinese national style , and suitable for display in super-market.

sentences.english: I just had a super-duper meal in the restaurant.

sentences.english: The link is the growing strain on the world"s sole superpower. America is locked into a draining and demoralising war."
sentences.chinese: 這個聯繫就是全球唯一超級大國面臨的壓力日益增加。

sentences.english: Constitutional Affairs, Ford F150 2004 Super four-wheel drive.

sentences.english: Has destroyed Argentina's 5 "the super colors" the attack airplane.

sentences.english: There have only ever been 106 verified supercentenarians in the UK.

definition: so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
